products.name: Jenny Wilson
products.review: The fod was excellent and so was the service. I had the mushroom risotto with scallops which was awesome. I had a burger over greens (gluten-free) which was also very good. They were very conscientious about gluten allergies.

products.name: Dianne Russell
products.review: We enjoyed the Eggs Benedict served on homemade focaccia bread and hot coffee. Perfect service.

products.name: Cameron Williamson
products.review: Amazing avocado toast with a poached egg. The fresh ingredients made all the difference.

products.name: Leslie Alexander
products.review: The omelette was decent, but the service was a bit slow. Overall, an average experience.

products.name: Guy Hawkins
products.review: Best breakfast burrito I've ever had! The salsa was fresh and spicy, just the way I like it.

products.name: Jenny Wilson
products.review: Great place for a quick breakfast. The bagels were fresh and the cream cheese was delicious.

products.name: Eleanor Pena
products.review: I loved the French toast with fresh berries and whipped cream. A delightful start to the day.

products.name: Jacob Jones
products.review: The scrambled eggs were a bit overcooked, but the hash browns were crispy and tasty.

products.name: Courtney Henry
products.review: The smoothie bowl was refreshing and healthy. A great option for a light breakfast.

products.name: Arlene McCoy
products.review: Excellent breakfast sandwich with bacon, egg, and cheese. The bread was fresh and warm.
